Mendokusai

Tartarus

Adam Ondra

Published 17 Jun 2019 in Climbing

After a brief hiatus from watching Adam Ondra videos, the YouTube algorithm has finally put me back in my place and reminded me that I should be watching more Adam Ondra videos. An insanely talented climber, watching him scream as he sends crazy routes has provided a welcome boost of motivation on an otherwise uneventful Monday.
